channel.title: Jupyter on Jameson Thai
channel.description: Recent content in Jupyter on Jameson Thai

item.title: Amazon Reviews - Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Leading two fellow students to develop a Python recomendation system for suggesting ratings for a user’s review through collabortive filters and machine learning algorithms achieving our highest accuracy of 89%. This is a multi-classification Goals Acquire Amazon Dataset Exploratory analysis of dataset Use ML Algorithms to predict review ratings Build Jupyter notebook to predict ratings Visualize preprocessed information and compiled Bag Of Words Present findings to general and informed audience Algorithms KNN Naive Bayes Ordered Logistic Regression Linear SVM Doc2Vec Decision Trees Dataset We filtered the initial dataset of over 12 million reviews (12 GB) into five separate csv corresponding to their star ratings using Pandas.
